title: [K-12] Simulation-Based Education for Predictive Modeling of Cardiac Diseases

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational machine learning concepts and experience in medical data analysis
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education to enhance competencies in developing predictive models based on medical data.

learning_goals: Learners can apply preprocessing and feature engineering techniques to cardiac disease datasets.
Learners can implement and compare prediction performance across four classification models: KNN, SVM, ANN, and CNN.
Learners can evaluate model performance using precision, recall, and classification accuracy (CA) metrics.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
